dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Raw Meal Preparation. The limestone, clay, and laterite are successively crushed by a hammer crusher and an impact crusher to obtain particles with a diameter particle size below 20 mm. Next, all the raw materials, except for the gypsum, are placed into the raw mill at corresponding ratios and are subsequently milled to a mixture, which is called “the raw meal”. The raw meal is dried in cyclone separators at an atmosphere filled with high-temperature gas from the kiln. Electricity is the primary energy source in this process.Modified granulated copper slag (MGCS) preparation is a crucial phase. The original copper slag was procured from a smelter of Boliden Mineral AB, Stockholm, Sweden. This was ground in the raw mill to form granulated copper slag (GCS) with a particle size lower than 0.60 mm. The CaO (99.9% pure) was supplied by Changsha Danuo Building Materials Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The procedure of MGCS production is as follows. The GCS and CaO (20 wt.%) were charged in the furnace while the heating temperature was raised to approximately 1550 ◦C, at which point the mixtures were completely molten. The water-quenching method was then adopted to form the MGCS. The entire process was carried out within a nitrogen atmosphere with a flow rate of 150 mL/min. This procedure was conducted in the Changsha Research Institute of Mining and Metallurgy Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The produced MGCS was eventually transported by trucks to the cement plant, which uses electricity as the main energy source.

生料制备。石灰石、粘土和红土依次通过锤式破碎机和冲击式破碎机被粉碎成直径粒径低于20毫米的颗粒。接下来，所有的原材料，除了石膏以外，按照相应的比例放入原料磨中，随后被磨成一种叫做“生料”的混合物。生料在旋风分离器中在充满来自窑的高温气体的环境中干燥。在这个过程中，电力是主要的能源来源。改性粒状铜渣（modified granulated copper slag，MGCS）制备是一个关键的阶段。原始的铜渣来自瑞典斯德哥尔摩的博利登矿物股份有限公司的冶炼厂。将其磨成颗粒直径小于0.60毫米的粒状铜渣（granulated copper slag，GCS）。CaO（99.9％纯）由长沙大诺建材有限公司供应。MGCS生产的步骤如下。GCS和CaO（20重量％）在加热温度升至约1550℃时被装入炉中，此时混合物完全熔化。然后采用水淬法形成MGCS。整个过程在氮气环境中进行，氮气流量为150毫升/分钟。这个过程在长沙矿冶研究院有限公司进行。生产出的MGCS最终被卡车运到以电力为主要能源的水泥厂。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: A typical cement plant in Changsha, Hunan Province, China
湖南省长沙市内某典型水泥厂

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: MGCS preparation is a crucial phase. The original copper slag was procured from a smelter of Boliden Mineral AB, Stockholm, Sweden. This was ground in the raw mill to form GCS with a particle size lower than 0.60 mm. The CaO (99.9% pure) was supplied by Changsha Danuo Building Materials Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The procedure of MGCS production is as follows. The GCS and CaO (20 wt.%) were charged in the furnace while the heating temperature was raised to approximately 1550 ◦C, at which point the mixtures were completely molten [23]. The water-quenching method was then adopted to form the MGCS. The entire process was carried out within a nitrogen atmosphere with a flow rate of 150 mL/min [24]. This procedure was conducted in the Changsha Research Institute of Mining and Metallurgy Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The produced MGCS was eventually transported by trucks to the cement plant, which uses electricity as the main energy source.

MGCS preparation is a crucial phase. The original copper slag was procured from a smelter of Boliden Mineral AB, Stockholm, Sweden. This was ground in the raw mill to form GCS with a particle size lower than 0.60 mm. The CaO (99.9% pure) was supplied by Changsha Danuo Building Materials Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The procedure of MGCS production is as follows. The GCS and CaO (20 wt.%) were charged in the furnace while the heating temperature was raised to approximately 1550 ◦C, at which point the mixtures were completely molten [23]. The water-quenching method was then adopted to form the MGCS. The entire process was carried out within a nitrogen atmosphere with a flow rate of 150 mL/min [24]. This procedure was conducted in the Changsha Research Institute of Mining and Metallurgy Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The produced MGCS was eventually transported by trucks to the cement plant, which uses electricity as the main energy source.
technology.technologicalApplicability: The technical application of the described industrial process involves the preparation of raw meal and modified granulated copper slag (MGCS) for cement production. Limestone, clay, and laterite are processed to form the raw meal, which serves as the base material in the manufacture of cement. MGCS, produced by the combination of granulated copper slag and calcium oxide, is utilized in enhancing the properties of cement, contributing to its compressive strength. The process takes place in a controlled nitrogen atmosphere and involves high-temperature operations.
所述工业过程的技术应用涉及为水泥生产准备生料和改性粒状铜渣（MGCS）。石灰石、粘土和红土被处理形成生料，作为水泥制造的基础材料。通过结合粒状铜渣和氧化钙生产的MGCS，用于提高水泥的性能，有助于其抗压强度。该过程在控制的氮气环境中进行，并涉及高温操作。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: A functional unit (FU) is defined as 1 kg of mixed cement with a compressive strength of 42.9 MPa.
功能单位（FU）被定义为具有42.9 MPa抗压强度的1千克混合水泥。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Some data related to the background system were obtained from the Ecoinvent 3.1 database.
与背景系统相关的数据从Ecoinvent 3.1数据库中获得。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Inventory data for the Prospect system is collected directly from cement plants located in Changsha, Hunan Province, China.
前景系统的清单数据是直接从位于中国湖南省长沙市的水泥厂收集的。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Qinli Zhang, Bingyi Zhang, & Daolin Wang. (2022). Environmental Benefit Assessment of Blended Cement with Modified Granulated Copper Slag. MATERIALS, 15(15).
Qinli Zhang, Bingyi Zhang, & Daolin Wang. (2022). Environmental Benefit Assessment of Blended Cement with Modified Granulated Copper Slag. MATERIALS, 15(15).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment, it is essential to consider the geographical and technological context of the information, as it is specific to a cement plant in Changsha, Hunan Province, China. Original data for MGCS preparation was sourced from a specific smelter and concrete composition data may vary. Data related to the background system is derived from the Ecoinvent 3.1 database, and users should ensure compatibility with this source. The functional unit is defined as 1 kilogram of mixed cement with a specified compressive strength, and this should be consistently applied across the LCA study.
在利用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，必须考虑信息的地理和技术背景，因为它特定于中国湖南省长沙市的水泥厂。MGCS准备的原始数据来自特定的冶炼厂，混凝土成分数据可能会有所不同。与背景系统相关的数据源自Ecoinvent 3.1数据库，用户应确保与此来源的兼容性。功能单位定义为具有特定抗压强度的1千克混合水泥，应在整个生命周期评估研究中一致应用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: PM. The particle size is not specified. Here we treat it as PM>10.
